subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Television
Computers and the Internet
lead_paragraph: As the Winter Games from Sochi, Russia, begin, it is worth remembering that four years ago from Vancouver, NBC streamed only hockey and curling. Now, all 15 sports will be streamed live.
snippet: As the Winter Games from Sochi, Russia, begin, it is worth remembering that four years ago from Vancouver, NBC streamed only hockey and curling. Now, all 15 sports will be streamed live.
